build.buildCommand: apt-get update && apt-get install -y python3-pkgutil-resolve-name && pip install -r requirements.txt

deploy.startCommand: . /opt/venv/bin/activate && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py migrate && gunicorn --workers=4 DataTraining.wsgi

services.name: web
services.startCommand: . /opt/venv/bin/activate && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput && python manage.py migrate && gunicorn --workers=4 DataTraining.wsgi

services.name: worker
services.startCommand: . /opt/venv/bin/activate && cd /app && pip install pkgutil-resolve-name && celery -A DataTraining worker --loglevel=info
